item.description: For everyone who can make it on this date, please don't forget to wish Albert a happy birthday. If you haven't met Albert before he is easy to recognize. He is a handsome fawn colored pug with a very buff build to him. If you are still having difficulty recognizing our birthday boy then try to locate his mom who is a hip looking blonde who might be wearing big Chanel sunglasses and she will introduce you to Albert.
item.name: Pug Meet Up
